name: iMomentous, Inc
tag_list: mobile, mobile-talent-solutions, mobile-recruitment, mobile-recruiting, mobile-retention, mobile-jobseeker
overview:
iMomentous is a mobile talent solutions company. Our products help enterprises to attract, recruit, engage and retain the right people.

A mobile products company focused on enterprise talent solutions. We believe mobile is the platform for talent engagement of jobseekers and employees of any enterprise. Our products CareerConnect & EmployeeConnect deliver enterprise mobile recruitment & retention solutions.

Products CareerConnect – Mobile Talent Acquisition Platform Using mobile devices to create a new recruitment channel. Enable jobseeker’s to search, share and apply directly from their phone. CareerConnect reduces cost per hire, time to hire and increases the quality of hire.

EmployeeConnect – Mobile Talent Retention Platform Employee referral, engagement and communication through mobile. EmployeeConnect is a mobile intranet that engages employees of an enterprise, which increases performance and productivity.
